span.a: You are currently on this page - COVID-19 Information

div.p: The School District of River Falls, innovative leader in personalized learning, ensures the development of every student’s unique potential in order to excel as responsible, productive, global citizens, facilitated by forward-thinking staff in a safe, nurturing and collaborative environment.

span.a: Please follow this link to the Distance Learning Page.

span.strong: Governor Evers and DHS Secretary-designee Palm have closed Wisconsin Schools.
River Falls Schools will be closed through April 24, 2020.
Lunches will be provided during the closure to River Falls students ages 18 and under.
If your family needs lunch assistance please follow the link on the right to sign up your family for pick-up or delivery options

span.b: El gobernador Evers y el designado por el Secretario del DHS, Palm, han cerrado las Escuelas de Wisconsin.

strong.span: Las escuelas de River Falls permanecerán cerradas hasta el 24 de abril de 2020.

span.b: La fecha de reapertura está sujeta a cambios en espera de más información.
Se proporcionarán almuerzos durante el cierre a los estudiantes de River Falls de 18 años o menos.

span.strong: Si su familia necesita asistencia para el almuerzo, siga el enlace a la derecha para inscribir a su familia en las opciones de recogida o entrega.

tr.td: Support programs for qualifying low-income customers

As the country deals with the effects of the Coronavirus (COVID-19), Comcast is taking immediate steps to help connect more low-income families to the Internet at home. Please follow the link for more information.
